s0373.chinese: 褒姒不好笑，幽王欲其笑萬方，故不笑。
s0373.literal: Bao Si did not like to laugh, King You wished her to laugh at any cost, therefore she did not laugh.
s0373.idiomatic: Bao Si did not like to laugh, King You wished her to laugh at any cost, therefore she did not laugh.

s0374.chinese: 幽王為烽燧大鼓，有寇至則舉烽火。
s0374.literal: King You made beacon fires and great drums, when invaders came they would light the beacons.
s0374.idiomatic: King You made beacon fires and great drums, when invaders came they would light the beacons.

s0375.chinese: 諸侯悉至，至而無寇，褒姒乃大笑。
s0375.literal: All the feudal lords arrived, arrived but there were no invaders, Bao Si then laughed greatly.
s0375.idiomatic: All the feudal lords arrived, arrived but there were no invaders, Bao Si then laughed greatly.

s0376.literal: King You was delighted, and repeatedly lit the beacon fires.
s0376.idiomatic: King You was delighted, and repeatedly lit the beacon fires.

s0377.chinese: 其後不信，諸侯益亦不至。
s0377.literal: Afterward it was not trusted, the feudal lords increasingly also did not come.
s0377.idiomatic: Afterward it was not trusted, the feudal lords increasingly also did not come.

s0378.chinese: 幽王以虢石父為卿，用事，國人皆怨。
s0378.literal: King You made Guo Shi Fu a minister, he handled affairs, the people of the capital all resented him.
s0378.idiomatic: King You made Guo Shi Fu a minister, he handled affairs, the people of the capital all resented him.

s0379.chinese: 石父為人佞巧善諛好利，王用之。
s0379.literal: Shi Fu was a person who was sycophantic, clever, good at flattery, and greedy for profit, the king employed him.
s0379.idiomatic: Shi Fu was a person who was sycophantic, clever, good at flattery, and greedy for profit, the king employed him.

s0380.literal: He again deposed Shen Hou, removed the crown prince.
s0380.idiomatic: He again deposed Shen Hou, removed the crown prince.

s0381.chinese: 申侯怒，與繒、西夷犬戎攻幽王。
s0381.literal: Shen Hou was angry, with Zeng and the western barbarians the Quanrong attacked King You.
s0381.idiomatic: Shen Hou was angry, with Zeng and the western barbarians the Quanrong attacked King You.

s0382.chinese: 幽王舉烽火徵兵，兵莫至。
s0382.literal: King You lit the beacon fires to summon troops, but no troops arrived.
s0382.idiomatic: King You lit the beacon fires to summon troops, but no troops arrived.

s0383.chinese: 遂殺幽王驪山下，虜褒姒，盡取周賂而去。
s0383.literal: Thus they killed King You at the foot of Li Mountain, captured Bao Si, took all Zhou's treasures and left.
s0383.idiomatic: Thus they killed King You at the foot of Li Mountain, captured Bao Si, took all Zhou's treasures and left.

s0384.chinese: 於是諸侯乃即申侯而共立故幽王太子宜臼，是為平王，以奉周祀。
s0384.literal: Therefore the feudal lords went to Shen Hou and together established the former King You's crown prince Yi Jiu, this was King Ping, to continue the Zhou sacrifices.
s0384.idiomatic: Therefore the feudal lords went to Shen Hou and together established the former King You's crown prince Yi Jiu, this was King Ping, to continue the Zhou sacrifices.

s0385.chinese: 平王立，東遷于雒邑，辟戎寇。
s0385.literal: King Ping ascended, moved east to Luoyi, to avoid the Rong invaders.
s0385.idiomatic: King Ping ascended, moved east to Luoyi, to avoid the Rong invaders.

s0386.chinese: 平王之時，周室衰微，諸侯彊并弱，齊、楚、秦、晉始大，政由方伯。
s0386.literal: In King Ping's time, the Zhou house declined and weakened, the feudal lords strong annexed the weak, Qi, Chu, Qin, Jin began to grow great, government was by the regional lords.
s0386.idiomatic: In King Ping's time, the Zhou house declined and weakened, the feudal lords strong annexed the weak, Qi, Chu, Qin, Jin began to grow great, government was by the regional lords.

s0387.literal: Forty-ninth year, Duke Yin of Lu ascended.
s0387.idiomatic: Forty-ninth year, Duke Yin of Lu ascended.

s0388.chinese: 五十一年，平王崩，太子洩父蚤死，立其子林，是為桓王。
s0388.literal: Fifty-first year, King Ping died, crown prince Xie Fu died early, established his son Lin, this was King Huan.
s0388.idiomatic: Fifty-first year, King Ping died, crown prince Xie Fu died early, established his son Lin, this was King Huan.

s0389.literal: King Huan was King Ping's grandson.
s0389.idiomatic: King Huan was King Ping's grandson.

s0390.chinese: 桓王三年，鄭莊公朝，桓王不禮。
s0390.literal: King Huan's third year, Zheng Zhuang Gong came to court, King Huan was discourteous.
s0390.idiomatic: King Huan's third year, Zheng Zhuang Gong came to court, King Huan was discourteous.

s0391.literal: Fifth year, Zheng resented it, exchanged Xu fields with Lu.
s0391.idiomatic: Fifth year, Zheng resented it, exchanged Xu fields with Lu.

s0392.chinese: 許田，天子之用事太山田也。
s0392.literal: Xu field was the field where the Son of Heaven performed rituals to Mount Tai.
s0392.idiomatic: Xu field was the field where the Son of Heaven performed rituals to Mount Tai.
